userscripts.jsonMeta:
{
    "name": "Disable AMP",
    "name:ko": "AMP ",
    "name:zh": " AMP",
    "name:lt": "Ijungti AMP",
    "name:ar": " AMP",
    "name:pl": "Wycz AMP",
    "name:de": "AMP deaktivieren",
    "name:pt": "Desativar AMP",
    "name:et": "Keela AMP",
    "name:ro": "Dezactivare AMP",
    "name:fr": "Dsactiver AMP",
    "name:ja": "AMP",
    "name:zh-TW": "AMP",
    "name:vi": "V hiu ha AMP",
    "name:uk": " AMP",
    "name:ru": " AMP",
    "name:bg": " AMP",
    "name:id": "Nonaktifkan AMP",
    "name:fa": "    ",
    "name:es": "Deshabilitar AMP",
    "namespace": "adguard",
    "description": "This is a very simple userscript that disables AMP on the Google search results page.",
    "description:ko": " Google    AMP     .",
    "description:zh": " Google  AMP ",
    "description:lt": "Tai labai paprastas naudotojo skriptas, atjungiantis AMP Google paiekos rezultat puslapyje.",
    "description:ar": "       AMP    Google.",
    "description:pl": "Jest to bardzo prosty skrypt uytkownika, ktry wycza AMP na stronie wynikw wyszukiwania Google.",
    "description:de": "Dies ist ein sehr einfaches Userscript, das AMP auf der Seite der Google-Suchergebnisse deaktiviert.",
    "description:pt": "Este  um script muito simples que desativa o AMP na pgina de resultados de pesquisa do Google.",
    "description:et": "Tegemist on lihtsa kasutajaskriptiga, mis keelab Google otsingutulemustes AMP-i.",
    "description:ro": "Acesta este un script utilizator foarte simplu pentru a dezactiva AMP n pagina cu rezultatele cautrii Google.",
    "description:fr": "C'est un script utilisateur trs simple pour dsactiver AMP sur les pages de rsultats de Google.",
    "description:ja": "GoogleAMP",
    "description:zh-TW": " Google AMP",
    "description:vi": "y l mt m t ngi dng rt n gin, v hiu ha AMP trn trang kt qu tm kim ca Google.",
    "description:uk": "    ,   AMP     Google.",
    "description:ru": " -   ,   AMP    Google.",
    "description:bg": "     ,   AMP        Google.",
    "description:id": "Ini adalah userscript yang sangat mudah yang dapat menonaktifkan AMP pada halaman hasil pencarian Google.",
    "description:fa": "                   .",
    "description:es": "Este es un userscript muy simple que deshabilita AMP en la pgina de resultados de bsqueda de Google.",
    "version": "1.0.4",
    "updateURL": "https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/disable-amp/1.0/disable-amp.meta.js",
    "downloadURL": "https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/disable-amp/1.0/disable-amp.user.js",
    "homepageURL": "https://adguard.com/",
    "supportURL": "",
    "run-at": "document-end",
    "icon": "",
    "icon64": "",
    "noframes": false,
    "match": [
    ],
    "include": [
        "https://www.google.*/*"
    ],
    "exclude": [
    ],
    "grant": [
        "none"
    ],
    "connect": [
    ],
    "require": [
    ],
    "resource": [
    ]
}

meta.description: This is a very simple userscript that disables AMP on the Google search results page.

descriptionTranslations.de: Dies ist ein sehr einfaches Userscript, das AMP auf der Seite der Google-Suchergebnisse deaktiviert.
descriptionTranslations.pt: Este  um script muito simples que desativa o AMP na pgina de resultados de pesquisa do Google.
descriptionTranslations.lt: Tai labai paprastas naudotojo skriptas, atjungiantis AMP Google paiekos rezultat puslapyje.
descriptionTranslations.fr: C'est un script utilisateur trs simple pour dsactiver AMP sur les pages de rsultats de Google.
descriptionTranslations.es: Este es un userscript muy simple que deshabilita AMP en la pgina de resultados de bsqueda de Google.
descriptionTranslations.et: Tegemist on lihtsa kasutajaskriptiga, mis keelab Google otsingutulemustes AMP-i.
descriptionTranslations.vi: y l mt m t ngi dng rt n gin, v hiu ha AMP trn trang kt qu tm kim ca Google.
descriptionTranslations.id: Ini adalah userscript yang sangat mudah yang dapat menonaktifkan AMP pada halaman hasil pencarian Google.
descriptionTranslations.pl: Jest to bardzo prosty skrypt uytkownika, ktry wycza AMP na stronie wynikw wyszukiwania Google.
descriptionTranslations.ro: Acesta este un script utilizator foarte simplu pentru a dezactiva AMP n pagina cu rezultatele cautrii Google.

meta.name: Disable AMP

userscripts.jsonMeta:
{
    "name": "AdGuard Extra",
    "name:sr": "AdGuard dodatno",
    "name:sk": "AdGuard Extra",
    "name:pt-PT": "AdGuard Extra",
    "name:lt": "AdGuard Extra",
    "name:hr": "AdGuard Extra",
    "name:be": "AdGuard Extra",
    "namespace": "adguard",
    "description": "AdGuard Extra is designed to solve complicated cases when regular ad blocking rules aren't enough.",
    "description:ko": "AdGuard Extra          .",
    "description:zh": "AdGuard Extra",
    "description:nl": "AdGuard Extra wordt verondersteld ingewikkelde gevallen op te lossen wanneer de reguliere regels voor het blokkeren van advertenties niet voldoende zijn.",
    "description:ar": "    AdGuard Extra          .",
    "description:no": "AdGuard Extra skal lse kompliserte problemer nr vanlige annonseblokkeringsregler ikke er nok.",
    "description:cs": "AdGuard Extra by ml vyeit problmy, u kterch bn pravidla pro blokovn nesta.",
    "description:pl": "AdGuard Extra ma za zadanie rozwizanie skomplikowanych przypadkw, gdy zawodz zasady zwykych programw blokujcych reklamy.",
    "description:de": "AdGuard Extra soll komplizierte Aufgaben lsen, wenn regelmige Regeln zur Werbeblockierung nicht ausreichen.",
    "description:pt-PT": "O AdGuard Extra  indicado para resolver casos complicados onde as regras regulares de bloqueio de anncios no so suficientes.",
    "description:es": "AdGuard Extra est diseado para resolver casos complicados cuando las reglas regulares de bloqueo de anuncios no son suficientes.",
    "description:pt": "O AdGuard Extra  indicado para resolver casos complicados onde as regras regulares de bloqueio de anncios no so suficientes.",
    "description:fa": "        AdGuard Extra     .",
    "description:ro": "AdGuard Extra este conceput s rezolve cazurile complicate n care regulile obinuite de blocare a reclamelor nu sunt suficiente.",
    "description:he": "AdGuard Extra            .",
    "description:ru": "AdGuard Extra      ,      .",
    "description:hu": "Az AdGuard Extra arra szolgl, hogy bonyolult eseteket oldjon meg akkor, amikor a hagyomnyos reklmblokkolsi szablyok nem elgsgesek.",
    "description:sk": "AdGuard Extra m vyriei zloit prpady, ke ben pravidl blokovania reklm nestaia.",
    "description:it": "AdGuard Extra  destinato a risolvere i casi complicati in cui le regole di blocco degli annunci regolari non sono sufficienti.",
    "description:sl": "AdGuard Extra naj bi reil zapletene primere, ko obiajna pravila za zaviranje oglasov niso dovolj.",
    "description:be": "AdGuard Extra    ,      .",
    "description:sr": "AdGuard Extra trebalo bi da rei komplikovane sluajeve u kojima standardna pravila blokiranja reklama nisu dovoljna.",
    "description:da": "AdGuard Extra skal lse komplicerede sager, nr de almindelige annonceblokeringsregler ikke er nok.",
    "description:sv": "AdGuard Extra ska lsa komplicerade fall nr vanliga regler fr reklamblockering inte rcker till.",
    "description:et": "AdGuard Ekstra eesmrk on lahendada keerulisi juhtumeid, kui tavalistest reklaami blokeerimis reeglitest ei piisa.",
    "description:hr": "AdGuard Extra je dizajniran za rjeavanje kompleksnih sluajeva kada opa pravila blokade oglasa nisu dovoljna.",
    "description:zh-TW": "AdGuard Extra ",
    "description:vi": "AdGuard Extra c dng  gii quyt cc trng hp phc tp khi cc quy tc chn qung co thng thng khng th p ng.",
    "description:uk": "AdGuard Extra     ,       .",
    "description:tr": "AdGuard Extra, normal reklam engelleme kurallarnn yeterli olmad karmak durumlar zmek iin tasarlanmtr.",
    "description:hy": "AdGuard Extra      ,      :",
    "description:fr": "AdGuard Extra doit rsoudre des problmes compliqus o les rgles de blocage classiques ne fonctionnent pas.",
    "description:bg": "AdGuard Extra   ,           .",
    "description:lt": "AdGuard Extra yra skirtas isprsti sudtingesnius atvejus, kai nepakanka prast skelbim blokavimo taisykli.",
    "description:ja": "",
    "version": "1.0.91",
    "updateURL": "https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js",
    "downloadURL": "https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js",
    "homepageURL": "https://adguard.com/",
    "supportURL": "",
    "run-at": "document-start",
    "icon": "",
    "icon64": "",
    "noframes": false,
    "match": [
        "*://*/*"
    ],
    "include": [
    ],
    "exclude": [
        "*://mil.ru/*",
        "*wikipedia.org*",
        "*icloud.com*",
        "*hangouts.google.com*",
        "*www.facebook.com/plugins/*",
        "*www.facebook.com/v*/plugins*",
        "*disqus.com/embed/comments*",
        "*vk.com/widget*",
        "*twitter.com/intent/*",
        "*www.youtube.com/embed/*",
        "*player.vimeo.com*",
        "*coub.com/embed*",
        "*staticxx.facebook.com/connect/xd_arbiter/*",
        "*vk.com/q_frame*",
        "*tpc.googlesyndication.com*",
        "*syndication.twitter.com*",
        "*platform.twitter.com*",
        "*tutosdeath.blogspot.com*",
        "*notifications.google.com*",
        "*google.com/recaptcha/*",
        "*bizmania.ru/*"
    ],
    "grant": [
        "unsafeWindow"
    ],
    "connect": [
    ],
    "require": [
    ],
    "resource": [
    ]
}

meta.description: AdGuard Extra is designed to solve complicated cases when regular ad blocking rules aren't enough.

descriptionTranslations.no: AdGuard Extra skal lse kompliserte problemer nr vanlige annonseblokkeringsregler ikke er nok.
descriptionTranslations.de: AdGuard Extra soll komplizierte Aufgaben lsen, wenn regelmige Regeln zur Werbeblockierung nicht ausreichen.
descriptionTranslations.pt: O AdGuard Extra  indicado para resolver casos complicados onde as regras regulares de bloqueio de anncios no so suficientes.
descriptionTranslations.lt: AdGuard Extra yra skirtas isprsti sudtingesnius atvejus, kai nepakanka prast skelbim blokavimo taisykli.
descriptionTranslations.hr: AdGuard Extra je dizajniran za rjeavanje kompleksnih sluajeva kada opa pravila blokade oglasa nisu dovoljna.
descriptionTranslations.fr: AdGuard Extra doit rsoudre des problmes compliqus o les rgles de blocage classiques ne fonctionnent pas.
descriptionTranslations.hu: Az AdGuard Extra arra szolgl, hogy bonyolult eseteket oldjon meg akkor, amikor a hagyomnyos reklmblokkolsi szablyok nem elgsgesek.
descriptionTranslations.sk: AdGuard Extra m vyriei zloit prpady, ke ben pravidl blokovania reklm nestaia.
descriptionTranslations.sl: AdGuard Extra naj bi reil zapletene primere, ko obiajna pravila za zaviranje oglasov niso dovolj.
descriptionTranslations.sr: AdGuard Extra trebalo bi da rei komplikovane sluajeve u kojima standardna pravila blokiranja reklama nisu dovoljna.
descriptionTranslations.sv: AdGuard Extra ska lsa komplicerade fall nr vanliga regler fr reklamblockering inte rcker till.
descriptionTranslations.it: AdGuard Extra  destinato a risolvere i casi complicati in cui le regole di blocco degli annunci regolari non sono sufficienti.
descriptionTranslations.es: AdGuard Extra est diseado para resolver casos complicados cuando las reglas regulares de bloqueo de anuncios no son suficientes.
descriptionTranslations.et: AdGuard Ekstra eesmrk on lahendada keerulisi juhtumeid, kui tavalistest reklaami blokeerimis reeglitest ei piisa.
descriptionTranslations.cs: AdGuard Extra by ml vyeit problmy, u kterch bn pravidla pro blokovn nesta.
descriptionTranslations.pt-PT: O AdGuard Extra  indicado para resolver casos complicados onde as regras regulares de bloqueio de anncios no so suficientes.
descriptionTranslations.vi: AdGuard Extra c dng  gii quyt cc trng hp phc tp khi cc quy tc chn qung co thng thng khng th p ng.
descriptionTranslations.pl: AdGuard Extra ma za zadanie rozwizanie skomplikowanych przypadkw, gdy zawodz zasady zwykych programw blokujcych reklamy.
descriptionTranslations.ro: AdGuard Extra este conceput s rezolve cazurile complicate n care regulile obinuite de blocare a reclamelor nu sunt suficiente.
descriptionTranslations.da: AdGuard Extra skal lse komplicerede sager, nr de almindelige annonceblokeringsregler ikke er nok.
descriptionTranslations.nl: AdGuard Extra wordt verondersteld ingewikkelde gevallen op te lossen wanneer de reguliere regels voor het blokkeren van advertenties niet voldoende zijn.
descriptionTranslations.tr: AdGuard Extra, normal reklam engelleme kurallarnn yeterli olmad karmak durumlar zmek iin tasarlanmtr.

meta.name: AdGuard Extra
